verses.name: Deuteronomy 9:23
verses.text: Likewise when the Lord sent you from Kadesh–barnea, saying, Go up and possess the land which I have given you; then ye rebelled against the commandment of the Lord your God, and ye believed him not, nor hearkened to his voice.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 9:24
verses.text: Ye have been rebellious against the Lord from the day that I knew you.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 9:25
verses.text: Thus I fell down before the Lord forty days and forty nights, as I fell down at the first; because the Lord had said he would destroy you.
